summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a settlement related to Steve Cutler and Alan Greenberg. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and suggests that there has been a lack of follow-up since their previous conversation.

Jeffrey Epstein emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication.
There is a noted lack of follow-up since a previous conversation regarding the settlement.
